text:
Hi Anthony!

Nice to mee you, they didn't tell me much about you so thank you for introducing yourself!
Also, I don't know how much you know about me, I did the application several months ago so things may have changed since then. So I'll give you an overview as well.

I moved to London 5 years ago to study because where I am from in Italy creative careers aren't seen as something serious or even possible so I wanted to follow my passions and see if there was a different way of thinking.

I graduated in 2018 from the University of Greenwich where I achieved a First Class BSc Degree in Creative Digital Media. I'm attaching my CV for details.
I enjoyed the course because it gave me an overview of what was available out there. I mostly enjoyed the 3D animation courses that we did and for my dissertation, I decided to investigate more and learn Houdini by myself, it wasn't part of the course and my teachers didn't know what it was, but while I was learning it with online tutorials I realized that it was the only software that allowed my to achieve what I wanted for my final project and it's still is the best for me, so I also didn't look back since then.

alright, nice to meet you :)
I saw you are working as a render wrangler now. What would be your goals in this industry?
You mentioned 3D animation and made your dissertation on fluids simulations. There's a mention of compositing in your CV as well. Are you predominantly interested in FX or are you keen on any other domain?
Finally, what would be your expectations with this e-mentorship?
